ALAVY.PA.summary: AudioValley SA engages in the digital audio business worldwide. It operates Radionomy, a free platform that allows radio enthusiasts to broadcast, promote, and monetize their radio; Storever, an international agency offering instore solutions for brands covering music services, digital signage, interactive solutions, and audiovisual equipment for retail players; and Jamendo, an independent music community with thousands of artists sharing a catalogue of approximately 500,000 tracks to stream or download for free. The company was founded in 2007 and is headquartered in Anderlecht, Belgium.

EVS.BR.summary: EVS Broadcast Equipment SA provides live video technology for broadcast and media productions worldwide. It offers replay and effects tools for exchange, review, transcoding, storytelling graphics, and collaboration; range of assets to ingest, create, and manage enhanced content; unified live production systems that enable live switching, create replays and highlights, control audio, create and insert graphics, and play back content; production switchers; and AI-based camera automation systems. The company also provides multi-camera review systems; range of live production servers; IP infrastructures; and media storage solutions. In addition, it offers support services, such as download area, support portal, and repository of products. The company offers solutions in the areas of live sports images, entertainment shows, and news content. EVS Broadcast Equipment SA was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in Seraing, Belgium.

OINA.F.summary: Crescent NV, an end-to-end IoT solutions integrator, develops and implements IoT integration projects for various industries and applications in Belgium. It operates through three segments: Solutions, Services, and Lighting. The Solutions segment produces data cards, USB devices, routers, and built-in modules; and offers end-to-end services. It is also involved in building and maintaining telecom, and earthing and lightning installations; and the installation for wireless communication in closed spaces. The Services segment manages the IT environment and software for customers in public and private data center environments, as well as for small and medium-sized companies. The Lighting segment provides LED street lighting services. The company was founded in 2018 and is headquartered in Leuven, Belgium.

OPTI.BR.summary: Crescent NV, an end-to-end IoT solutions integrator, develops and implements IoT integration projects for various industries and applications in Belgium. It operates through three segments: Solutions, Services, and Lighting. The Solutions segment produces data cards, USB devices, routers, and built-in modules; and offers end-to-end services. It is also involved in building and maintaining telecom, and earthing and lightning installations; and the installation for wireless communication in closed spaces. The Services segment manages the IT environment and software for customers in public and private data center environments, as well as for small and medium-sized companies. The Lighting segment provides LED street lighting services. The company was founded in 2018 and is headquartered in Leuven, Belgium.

SSJA.SG.summary: Zenitel NV provides communication solutions in Belgium, Norway, Singapore, Finland, France, the United States, and internationally. It provides solutions and systems for the offshore and onshore communications markets, including building security and public safety, transportation, industrial, energy, and maritime primarily under the Zenitel, Vingtor-Stentofon, and Phontech brands. The company offers public address systems, such as central equipment, access panels, loudspeakers, beacons and signal units, network equipment, volume controllers, and accessories; and intercom systems, including talk-back, IP and analog intercom server, integrated maritime communication, SIP intercom, IC-edge, batterly less telephone, and hospital and refrigerator alarm systems. It also provides two-way radio systems; entertainment products comprising IPTV systems, background music and information systems, and COAX TVs; sound reception systems; and LAN, CCTV, and master clock solutions, as well as spare parts. The company was founded in 1901 and is headquartered in Zellik, Belgium.
